definition: content/calm/still/quiet/safe/secure/in good health/to find a place for/to install/to fix/to fit/to bring (a charge against sb)/to pacify/to harbor (good intentions)/security/safety/peace/ampere
band/belt/girdle/ribbon/tire/area/zone/region/CL:條|条[tiao2]/to wear/to carry/to take along/to bear (i.e. to have)/to lead/to bring/to look after/to raise

sentences.english: Yup, that’s right, helmets and seatbelts.
sentences.chinese: 對，就是這樣，頭盔和安全帶。

sentences.english: They act as small laminated springs and keep the belt strap flat.
sentences.chinese: 它們可以充當小小的疊片彈簧，讓安全帶保持平整度。

sentences.english: The technical requirements to light conveyor and processing belts are manifold.
sentences.chinese: 輕型輸送帶和加工安全帶的技術要求是多方面的。

sentences.english: Especially in the United States, it's a law that you have to wear your seatbelt.
sentences.chinese: 尤其在美國，法律規定開車時必須繫好安全帶。

sentences.english: To be effective, the seat-belt should be fastened tight and low.
sentences.chinese: 根據您的需要，調節安全帶的鬆緊。

sentences.english: Buckle up, it may harder for aliens to suck you out of your car.
sentences.chinese: 繫好安全帶，這樣外形人也更難把你從車子裏抓走。

sentences.english: Please unfasten your safety belt now.
Please make sure your seatbelt is properly secured at all times during this flight.
sentences.chinese: 請在飛行期間都要繫好您的座位安全帶。

sentences.english: Trad, Alpine and Sport climbing all require different harness setups.
sentences.chinese: 傳統攀，阿爾卑斯，運動攀都要求不同類型的安全帶。

sentences.english: The seat-belt legislation has been extended to bus drivers.
sentences.chinese: 安全帶法例已擴至適用於巴士司機。

sentences.english: When a plane begins to take off or land, its passengers should fasten their seat belt, too.
sentences.chinese: 當飛機開始起飛或降落的時候，乘客也應繫好安全帶。
任何時候均扣上安全帶。

sentences.english: It's much safer if you buckle up while driving.
sentences.chinese: 開車時繫好安全帶就會安全得多。

sentences.english: The line was connected to a harness in which the agent was strapped.
sentences.chinese: 那條線連到固定住特工的安全帶上。

sentences.english: Using back seat belts reduce casualties in fatal accidents up to 75%.
sentences.chinese: 使用安全帶可以減少高達75%事故傷亡率。

sentences.english: Stapp became a strong early proponent of automobile seat belts.
sentences.chinese: 斯塔普是力主在汽車上採用座椅安全帶的早期創導者。

definition: to abrade/to scrape/to chafe/to graze/abrasion/friction burn/scratch
to avoid/to yield (in traffic)/to get out of the way
